verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: demanded] [ARG1: Senators on Capital Hill approve a government spending package that sees money allocated for border security and a wall] .
President Donald Trump demanded [ARG0: Senators on Capital Hill] [V: approve] [ARG1: a government spending package that sees money allocated for border security and a wall] .
President Donald Trump demanded Senators on Capital Hill approve [ARG0: a government spending package] [R-ARG0: that] [V: sees] [ARG1: money allocated for border security and a wall] .
President Donald Trump demanded Senators on Capital Hill approve a government spending package that sees [ARG1: money] [V: allocated] [ARG2: for border security and a wall] .
